ANCESTORS.PARENT: PRODUCTION OR DISCLOSURE OF MATERIAL OR INFORMATION
Protection of Privacy and Access to Individual Records Under the Privacy Act of 1974

SECTION.SUBJECT: Fees.
SECTION.P: Components shall charge fees for duplication of records under the Privacy Act in the same way in which they charge duplication fees under ยง 16.11. No search or review fee may be charged for any record unless the record has been exempted from access under Exemptions (j)(2) or (k)(2) of the Privacy Act.
